Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2014 08:07AM armywife13 wrote: Good news, everything came back as chronic mastitis ! Bad news is the surgeon isn't sure how often it could flare up! A week after him discussing removing the lump or letting it be it flared up and he did an I&D on it! Not sure how that worked since it was more of a mass then anything! I have a history of pituitary issues so he's not sure if that has anything to do with the problems I am having! Thanks for everyone's support on here it was greatly appreciated!
Posts.Title: Not diagnosed but questioning dr armywife13 armywife13

Posts.Content: armywife13 wrote: I recently experienced a hard redness and painful area to my left breast. I immediately thought it was mastitis (I'm 44, and definitely not breast feeding) I was put on a 10 say course of keflex and the redness went away but I have a huge lump at 2 o'clock and a small one at 8 o'clock. US was suspicious findings not cystic, radiologist says it looks like "gunky junk" in a duct but has some lines like a solid mass. No biopsy Dr wants to wait 4weeks to see if inflammation (lump area) goes away! Wondering if I should have just asked for the biopsy and not waited! Any opinions? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not diagnosed but questioning dr armywife13 armywife13

Posts.Content: Jul 11, 2014 01:57PM armywife13 wrote: the wait is on again! When I called today the receptionist told me the doctor said that my specimen was sent out for a second opinion and I shouldn't worry because that happens! I think I'm losing my patience with the comments coming from radiology office! So not happy with that I called the surgeons office that started all this and asked if they could find out why it was going out! I'm a big girl tell me if they saw something weird or he just wanted to verify his negative results, anything was better than don't know anything until Tues! So upon the investigation they were sending it out for additional stains! That's a little more helpful! I called back before the office closed and there was a little bit in the computer that she read me and the major things she hit were leukocyte antigen + and lymphocyte antigen -, and something about histeocytic marker! Sound like anything useful to anyone? The nurse just kept saying I shouldn't be giving you results over the phone I could get in trouble! Well I was thankful she tried to help me, they are my results anyway! I was straight forward with her when I first called and said I just wanted to know why it was being sent out for additional testing I even told her "no need to blow smoke up my ass, I'm a big girl is rather know that then to worry for another 4 days! So I am back to waiting! Yippee
Posts.Title: Not diagnosed but questioning dr armywife13 armywife13

Posts.Content: Jun 13, 2014 08:09PM armywife13 wrote: thanks for everyone's opinions! I guess my concern was I finished the Keflex on Memorial Day and the lump is still there.  "Kicks" I'm not sure what the report said but when the radiologist called me for the suspicious findings that's how he explained it. The general surgeon was less than impressed with his report too! He said he wouldn't say anything clear for him to over! I guess I'll stop stressing and wait for the repeat US on Jul 3! Thank you everyone!
Posts.Title: Not diagnosed but questioning dr armywife13 armywife13

Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2014 08:47AM armywife13 wrote: Well I had the ultrasound repeated today by an actual radiologist and he  said I have to have a biopsy! That is scheduled for Tues, so hopefully all goes well!

Posts.Content: Jul 10, 2014 06:21PM armywife13 wrote: the wait is definitely the worse! They told me to call today at 10:00 to see if they had the results but of course they did not! They asked me to call back tomorrow at 10! I was really hoping to not have to get results on my 45th birthday! I guess if it's good news it won't be so bad!  While doing my biopsy he said he since I have more than one lump he did not think it was cancer! He also made the comment " if it was cancer you would know" hello I was really happy with everything he was saying up until that point! How in the world would I know? Well enough venting, hopefully I know something tomorrow!
